mapper.select: SELECT cg.id, cg.name, cg.createdby, (SELECT message FROM chat_log cl WHERE cl.groupid = cg.id ORDER BY cl.createdat DESC LIMIT 1) AS lastMessage, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM junction_chat_users_groups jcug WHERE jcug.groupId = cg.id) AS memberCount FROM chat_groups cg JOIN junction_chat_users_groups jcug ON cg.id = jcug.groupId WHERE jcug.userId = #{userId}
select userid from junction_chat_users_groups where groupid = #{groupId}
select groupid from junction_chat_users_groups where userid = #{userId}
select cg.* from chat_groups cg join junction_chat_users_groups j on cg.id = j.groupid where j.userid = #{userId}

select cg.* from chat_groups cg join junction_chat_users_groups j1 on cg.id = j1.groupid join junction_chat_users_groups j2 on cg.id = j2.groupid where cg.roomtype = 'PRIVATE' and j1.userid = #{param1} and j2.userid = #{param2}
